EmailTemplate.subject: Get what you need FAST--Ready to Ship from Office Depot.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Office Depot is one of the largest janitorial distributors in the country with a national presence and distribution capabilities to meet the needs of organizations of all sizes.
We help national companies such as INSERT COMPANY NAME reduce operating costs by leveraging your buying power, streamlining your product assortment, and standardizing a program for all your locations with next-day delivery capabilities. The right products help reduce time, labor cost, and allows your business to run more efficiently. We also have introduced a Ready to Ship program where the materials you need are stocked nationwide in our distribution centers. We have a 99.1% customer fill rate and we’re continually monitoring and improving our capabilities to make sure you have supplies when you need them.
I would like to speak to you to discuss your interest in utilizing our program in areas such as:
Janitorial items
Dispensers
Paper products
Plastic Can Liners
Hand Soap(s)
Floor Equipment
Misc. Cleaning Tools
Breakroom, Coffee & Water
Floor Matting
I’d appreciate the opportunity next week to discuss these capabilities and determine how they would benefit your organization.
Thank you,
